publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1460 Malcolm Chisholm: Tobacco Advertising and Promotion Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament endorses the need to ban tobacco advertising and promotion in Scotland as proposed to be set out in the Tobacco Advertising and Promotions Bill and agrees in principle that the relevant provisions in the Bill should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Susan Deacon*
S1M-1460 Malcolm Chisholm: Tobacco Advertising and Promotion Bill - UK Legislation: Withdrawn
